thumb.title: Sonic Cure Beat Up (English Fandub) [V2]
thumb.description: Just the same video, but without the cut off part in the beginning.Reuploaded from: AngelidiaDate: 10/25/2014Taken from: https://www.aparat.com/v/JOjF12ahUKEwjp75LCpcGNAxWFyjgGHZufPMwQo7QBegQICRAE&usg=AOvVaw0henExDzI4Brbg1ewbQOwNOriginal description: This animation comes from Sasi_Sage from NicoVideo and YT channel. I replaced the Japanese dialog to English. Thank you N0sSyndrome for doing the voice of Silver
